Support Bushfire Victims at bushfirehousing.org

11 Feb 2009

This is a fantastic idea. If you have a spare room or holiday home in (or near) Victoria, Australia, you can offer support to bushfire victims at http://bushfirehousing.org/.

Dan Walmsley
